box2D.dynamics.B2DebugDraw

type
class
Implement and register this class with a b2World to provide debug drawing of physics entities in your game.

Static Variables

e_aabbBit : Int

Draw axis aligned bounding boxes

e_centerOfMassBit : Int

Draw center of mass frame

e_controllerBit : Int

Draw controllers

e_jointBit : Int

Draw joint connections

e_pairBit : Int

Draw broad-phase pairs

e_shapeBit : Int

Draw shapes

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables

m_sprite : nme.display.Sprite

Instance Methods

appendFlags(flags : Int) : Void

Append flags to the current flags.

clearFlags(flags : Int) : Void

Clear flags from the current flags.

drawCircle(center : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2, radius : Float, color : box2D.common.B2Color) : Void

Draw a circle.

drawPolygon(vertices : Array<box2D.common.math.B2Vec2>, vertexCount : Int, color : box2D.common.B2Color) : Void

Draw a closed polygon provided in CCW order.

drawSegment(p1 : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2, p2 : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2, color : box2D.common.B2Color) : Void

Draw a line segment.

drawSolidCircle(center : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2, radius : Float, axis : box2D.common.math.B2Vec2, color : box2D.common.B2Color) : Void

Draw a solid circle.

drawSolidPolygon(vertices : Array<box2D.common.math.B2Vec2>, vertexCount : Int, color : box2D.common.B2Color) : Void

Draw a solid closed polygon provided in CCW order.

drawTransform(xf : box2D.common.math.B2Transform) : Void

parameters
xf a transform.
Draw a transform. Choose your own length scale.

getAlpha() : Float

Get the alpha value used for lines

getDrawScale() : Float

Get the draw

getFillAlpha() : Float

Get the alpha value used for fills

getFlags() : Int

Get the drawing flags.

getLineThickness() : Float

Get the line thickness

getSprite() : nme.display.Sprite

Get the sprite

getXFormScale() : Float

Get the scale used for drawing XForms

setAlpha(alpha : Float) : Void

Set the alpha value used for lines

setDrawScale(drawScale : Float) : Void

Set the draw scale

setFillAlpha(alpha : Float) : Void

Set the alpha value used for fills

setFlags(flags : Int) : Void

Set the drawing flags.

setLineThickness(lineThickness : Float) : Void

Set the line thickness

setSprite(sprite : nme.display.Sprite) : Void

Set the sprite

setXFormScale(xformScale : Float) : Void

Set the scale used for drawing XForms
